measure.name: exec
measure.sql: select stat_value from v$system_sql_stat where stat_name = 'CALL_EXECUTE'

measure.name: optdata
measure.sql: select stat_value from v$system_sql_stat where stat_name = 'CALL_OPTDATA'

measure.name: session
measure.sql: select count(*) from x$session@local where top_layer = 13

measure.name: g-session
measure.sql: select count(*) from x$session@local where top_layer = 13 and global_connection is true

measure.name: peer
measure.sql: select count(*) from x$session@local where program = 'cluster peer'

measure.name: long_Tx
measure.sql: select count(*) from x$transaction@local where datediff(SECOND,BEGIN_TIME,systimestamp) > 10
